reporting.reportgraph.GraphQuery:
SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)250183684e39ff52af1d30f3a85cfa979c7d1067ccd739086f28b3ec7d243534%}');
SELECT {%if (Columns == null) { "Date" } else { Columns }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)d7e89780c2c57e91abfa07d6a364bb32b9746364d9b0abb57f88e3a80d5d7044%} AS StartTime ,T1.Hits FROM {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)250183684e39ff52af1d30f3a85cfa979c7d1067ccd739086f28b3ec7d243534%}') AS Dates LEFT JOIN (SELECT HitsStartTime AS StartTime,SUM(HitsCount) AS hits FROM Analytics_Statistics INNER JOIN {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)21d9b54a1cd152dd8186629e23d3c79486d48c36a741c5f71f23be0687a5fd76%} ON {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)21d9b54a1cd152dd8186629e23d3c79486d48c36a741c5f71f23be0687a5fd76%}.HitsStatisticsID = Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID WHERE (StatisticsSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID) AND (StatisticsCode = 'pageviews') AND StatisticsObjectID = @NodeID AND StatisticsObjectCulture = @CultureCode GROUP BY HitsStartTime) AS T1 ON T1.StartTime = [Date]
